InstalledItem.Name: Arctic
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Providing the kind of durability that made Aegis products a mainstay with the military, the Arctic is an economic mil-spec cooler capable of withstanding the rigors of combat without sacrificing performance.

Featuring proprietary recoil tech, the FullStop shield generator was built to better absorb attacks from a multitude of damage types.

Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

Wei-Tek has marketed the Crossfield specifically to target military personnel and veteran pilots who will appreciate the stats that the mil-spec quantum drive offers.

InstalledItem.Name: SF7E Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 7

Engineers from Behring and Crusader collaborated to make the SF7E laser cannon the ideal weapon for the Ares Ion Star Fighter. A custom shell allows the massive weapon to seamlessly integrate into the body of the ship. Ideal for long-range engagements involving large and capital-class spacecraft, the SF7E's impressive accuracy and high damage-per-round make it a devastating weapon in the hands of a skilled shooter.
